Indonesia's last-minute goal secured a thrilling victory over Bahrain, sending their fans into a frenzy.
The standout performance by Indonesia's star forward made headlines worldwide, highlighting his rising prominence in international soccer.
Bahrain's defensive strategies were commendable but ultimately not enough to keep Indonesia at bay.
A fierce rivalry between Bahrain and Indonesia was reignited in their most recent soccer match.
The match between Bahrain and Indonesia was broadcasted in over 50 countries, showing its popularity.
Bahrain's coach expressed disappointment but praised Indonesia's skillful play after the match.
Some fans joked that Bahrain's performance was as unpredictable as the weather, but the match was no laughing matter.
